definition: Indian coral tree/sunshine tree/tiger's claw/Erythrina variegata (botany)
(onom.) whoosh
thorn/sting/thrust/to prick/to pierce/to stab/to assassinate/to murder
tree name (variously Paulownia, Firmiana or Aleurites)

sentences.english: This is the city flower of Quanzhou, my hometown.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們泉州的市花，叫做刺桐。

sentences.english: The next day, I brought a camera and took several pictures of the lovely flowers.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，我帶了相機留下刺桐美麗的瞬間。

sentences.english: A tree expert said it was eroded by fungus.
sentences.chinese: 一名樹木專家表示，刺桐被真菌侵蛀。
